001
002import java.awt.Color;
003import java.awt.Font;
004import java.awt.Graphics2D;
005import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
006import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
007import java.io.File;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Random;
011import javax.imageio.ImageIO;
012
013/**
014 * graph drawer
015 * @author matecsaba
016 */
017public class grapher {
018
019/**
020 * this is needed for cli startup
021 *
022 * @param args command line parameters
023 */
024public static void main(String[] args) {
025  grapher app = new grapher();
026  String a;
027  try {
028    ByteArrayOutputStream buf = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
029    a = "" + app.getClass();
030    a = app.httpRequest("http://localhost/" + a, "./" + a, "cli", "clibrowser", "user", args, buf);
031    a = "type=" + a + "\r\ndata:\r\n" + buf.toString();
032  } catch (Exception e) {
033    a = "exception " + e.getMessage();
034  }
035  System.out.println(a);
036}
037
038/**
039 * do one request
040 *
041 * @param url url of app
042 * @param path path of app
043 * @param peer client address
044 * @param agent user agent
045 * @param user auth data
046 * @param par parameters
047 * @param buf result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
048 * @return [pathname"][file name.]extension
049 * @throws Exception if something went wrong
050 */
051public String httpRequest(String url, String path, String peer, String agent, String user, String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf) throws Exception {
052  try {
053    str = par[0];
054    str = str.substring(str.indexOf("=") + 1, str.length());
055    BufferedImage img = doImage();
056    ImageIO.write(img, "png", buf);
057    return "png";
058  } catch (Exception e) {
059    buf.write(path.getBytes());
060    buf.write("...exception happened...".getBytes());
061    return "txt";
062  }
063}
064
065private String str;
066
067private int max;
068
069private String word() {
070  str = str.trim();
071  int i = str.indexOf(" ");
072  if (i < 0) {
073    String a = str;
074    str = "";
075    return a;
076  }
077  String a = str.substring(0, i).trim();
078  str = str.substring(i, str.length()).trim();
079  return a;
080}
081
082private static int str2num(String s) {
083  int i = 0;
084  s = s.trim();
085  try {
086    i = Integer.parseInt(s, 10);
087  } catch (Exception e) {
088  }
089  return i;
090}
091
092private int location(int i) {
093  if (i<0) i=0;
094  return  ((max - i) * 570) / max;
095}
096
097private BufferedImage doImage() {
098  List<Integer> rx = new ArrayList<Integer>();
099  List<Integer> tx = new ArrayList<Integer>();
100  List<Integer> dr = new ArrayList<Integer>();
101  for (;;) {
102    String s = word();
103    if (s.length() < 1) {
104      break;
105    }
106    if (!s.endsWith("s")) {
107      continue;
108    }
109    word();
110    rx.add(str2num(word()));
111    word();
112    tx.add(str2num(word()));
113    word();
114    dr.add(str2num(word()));
115  }
116  max = 0;
117  for (int i = 0; i < rx.size(); i++) {
118    int o = rx.get(i);
119    if (o > max) {
120      max = o;
121    }
122    o = tx.get(i);
123    if (o > max) {
124      max = o;
125    }
126  }
127  BufferedImage img = new BufferedImage(800, 600, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB);
128  Graphics2D g2d = img.createGraphics();
129  g2d.setBackground(Color.gray);
130  g2d.setFont(new Font("Serif", Font.BOLD, 20));
131  g2d.setPaint(Color.gray);
132  g2d.fillRect(0, 0, img.getWidth(), img.getHeight());
133  g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
134  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
135    int o = (max * i) / 10;
136    String a = "" + o;
137    if (o > 4096) {
138      o /= 1024;
139      a = o + "k";
140      if (o > 4096) {
141        o /= 1024;
142        a = o + "m";
143      }
144    }
145    g2d.drawString(a, 5, (10 - i) * 57);
146    o = (rx.size() * i) / 10;
147    g2d.drawString(o + "s", 80 + (i * 70), 595);
148  }
149  g2d.drawLine(80, 0, 80, 600);
150  g2d.drawLine(0, 570, 800, 570);
151  int or = location(rx.get(0));
152  int ot = location(tx.get(0));
153  int od = location(dr.get(0));
154  int ox = 80;
155  for (int i = 1; i < rx.size(); i++) {
156    int cr = location(rx.get(i));
157    int ct = location(tx.get(i));
158    int cd = location(dr.get(i));
159    int cx = 80 + ((i * 700) / rx.size());
160    g2d.setPaint(Color.green);
161    g2d.drawLine(ox, or, cx, cr);
162    g2d.setPaint(Color.red);
163    g2d.drawLine(ox, ot, cx, ct);
164    g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
165    g2d.drawLine(ox, od, cx, cd);
166    or = cr;
167    ot = ct;
168    od = cd;
169    ox = cx;
170  }
171  g2d.dispose();
172  return img;
173}
174
175}
